description:
As a merchant
  I want to create free gifts product and related promotion
  So that customers can buy my product along with free gift
name: Shop Checkout with two free gifts product

elements.name: After create free gifts product and promotin, checkout product and get free gifts

steps.name: I am on Admin Login Page
I fill correct account email to email field
I fill correct account password to password field
I click on login button
I should see successful login
I check intercom message notification frame and click clear intercom message button
I check intercom message notification frame and click intercom message close button
I check new feature alert notification frame and click new feature alert close button
I check and click exclude products panel close button
I check and click no thanks button
I am on Promotion Index Page
I input "6th Promotion" to search field
1st row of promotion list should contain "6th Promotion"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"6th Promotion Selected Products2020/06/10 01:00 AM toNever expiresAll Customers Auto Apply 6 / Unlimited Usage Record Edit","expectText":"6th Promotion"}

steps.name: I should see apply filter label
I should see row of select checkbox list
I click on 1st row of select checkbox list
I select publish of bulk actions dropdown
I should see alert
I am on Promotion Index Page
I input "16th Free Gift Promotion" to search field
1st row of promotion list should contain "16th Free Gift Promotion"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"16th Free Gift Promotion Selected Products2020/06/10 02:00 AM toNever expiresAll Customers Auto Apply 6 / Unlimited Usage Record Edit","expectText":"16th Free Gift Promotion"}

steps.name: I should see apply filter label
I should see row of select checkbox list
I click on 1st row of select checkbox list
I select publish of bulk actions dropdown
I should see alert
I am on Shop Product Index Page
I input "2nd Product for Checkout" to search field
1st product of products list should contain "2nd Product for Checkout"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"2nd Product for CheckoutNT$1","expectText":"2nd Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I click on 1st product of products list
I should be redirected to Shop Product Show Page
I fill "7" to product quantity field
I click on add to cart button
I should see cart panel
I am on Shop Product Index Page
I input "7th Product for Checkout" to search field
1st product of products list should contain "7th Product for Checkout"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"7th Product for CheckoutNT$100NT$49","expectText":"7th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: I click on 1st product of products list
I should be redirected to Shop Product Show Page
I fill "3" to product quantity field
I click on add to cart button
I should see cart panel
I click on checkout button
I should be redirected to Shop Cart Page
I select country dropdown option included "Taiwan" of country list dropdown
I wait for 5 seconds for loading
I select delivery dropdown option included "Local Delivery" of delivery method dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["Family Mart Pickup only (C2C)","(DBW) No integration 711 Pickup","Family Mart Pickup and pay in store (C2C)","(DBW) 7-11 B2C - Pickup and pay in store","(DBW) CustomDelivery","(DBW) Family Mart B2C - Pickup and pay in store","(DBW) - LocalDelivery","(DBW) Ezship pickup and pay in store","(DBW) 7-11 C2C - Pickup only","Family Mart Pickup only (B2C)","Family Mart Pickup and pay in store (B2C)","7-11 Pickup only (B2C)","7-11 Pickup only (C2C)","7-11 Pickup and pay in store (B2C)","7-11 Pickup and pay in store (C2C)","Custom Delivery","Family Mart Pickup (no integration)","7-11 Pickup (no integration)","Local Delivery","ezship pickup and pay in store","Tcat - Frozen","Tcat - Refrigerated","Tcat - Room Temp."],"text":"Local Delivery"}

steps.name: I wait for 5 seconds for loading
I select payment dropdown option included "Cash on Delivery" of payment method dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["Taishin","CVS via O'Pay","ATM via O'Pay","WebATM via O'Pay","Credit Card via O'Pay","Barcode via ECpay","CVS via ECpay","LINE Pay","Custom","Credit Card via ECpay","Credit card or Paypal (Paypal Express)","Cash on Delivery","(rollback data) Bank Transfer"],"text":"Cash on Delivery"}

steps.name: I wait for 5 seconds for loading
I click on proceed to checkout button
I should be redirected to Shop Checkout Page
I fill name to name field
I fill email to email address field
I fill phone to contact number field
I click on same as checkbox
I select delivery address dropdown option included "Taipei City" of 1st delivery address dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["          State / City\n        ","Taipei City","Keelung City","New Taipei City","Yilan County","Hsinchu City","Hsinchu County","Taoyuan City","Miaoli County","Taichung City","Changhua County","Nantou County","Chiayi City","Chiayi County","Yunlin County","Tainan City","Kaohsiung City","Pingtung County","Taitung County","Hualien County","          District\n        "],"text":"Taipei City"}

steps.name: I select delivery address dropdown option included "100 Zhongzheng District" of 2nd delivery address dropdown

embeddings.data: {"retryCount":1,"elementTexts":["          State / City\n        ","Taipei City","Keelung City","New Taipei City","Yilan County","Hsinchu City","Hsinchu County","Taoyuan City","Miaoli County","Taichung City","Changhua County","Nantou County","Chiayi City","Chiayi County","Yunlin County","Tainan City","Kaohsiung City","Pingtung County","Taitung County","Hualien County","          District\n        ","100 Zhongzheng District","103 Datong District","104 Zhongshan District","105 Songshan District","106 Da'an District","108 Wanhua District","110 Xinyi District","111 Shilin District","112 Beitou District","114 Neihu District","115 Nangang District","116 Wenshan District"],"text":"100 Zhongzheng District"}

steps.name: I fill address to delivery address field
I click on agree terms checkbox
I click on accept marketing checkbox
I click on place order button
I should be redirected to Shop Order Confirm Page
I click on summary collapse
1st row of product unit price should contain "NT$1"
1st row of product quantity should equal to "7"
1st row of product items should contain "2nd Product for Checkout"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"2nd Product for CheckoutPromotion6th PromotionNT$17NT$7","expectText":"2nd Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: 2nd row of product unit price should contain "NT$49"
2nd row of product quantity should equal to "3"
2nd row of product items should contain "7th Product for Checkout"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"7th Product for CheckoutBluePromotion6th PromotionNT$49NT$1003NT$147","expectText":"7th Product for Checkout"}

steps.name: 3rd row of product unit price should contain "NT$0"
3rd row of product quantity should equal to "6"
3rd row of product items should contain "1st Created Free Gift"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"Free Gift1st Created Free GiftPromotion16th Free Gift PromotionNT$06NT$0","expectText":"1st Created Free Gift"}

steps.name: item subtotal should contain "NT$154"
delivery fee should contain "NT$10"
total should contain "NT$94"
discount applied should contain "6th Promotion"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"Applied PromotionsPromotion6th Promotion - Selected Products: Get NT$70 off over 4 items-NT$70Promotion16th Free Gift Promotion - Selected Products: Get 6 Free Gift(s) (1st Created Free Gift) over 10 items-","expectText":"6th Promotion"}

steps.name: discount applied should contain "16th Free Gift Promotion"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"Applied PromotionsPromotion6th Promotion - Selected Products: Get NT$70 off over 4 items-NT$70Promotion16th Free Gift Promotion - Selected Products: Get 6 Free Gift(s) (1st Created Free Gift) over 10 items-","expectText":"16th Free Gift Promotion"}

steps.name: ---ROLL BACK---
I am on Promotion Index Page
I input "6th Promotion" to search field
I should see apply filter label
I should see 1 row of promotion list
1st row of promotion list should contain "6th Promotion"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"6th Promotion Selected Products2020/06/10 01:00 AM toNever expiresAll Customers Auto Apply 7 / Unlimited Usage Record Edit","expectText":"6th Promotion"}

steps.name: I click on 1st row of select checkbox list
I select unpublish of bulk actions dropdown
I should see 1 unpublished item
I am on Promotion Index Page
I input "16th Free Gift Promotion" to search field
I should see apply filter label
I should see 1 row of promotion list
1st row of promotion list should contain "16th Free Gift Promotion"

embeddings.data: {"elementText":"16th Free Gift Promotion Selected Products2020/06/10 02:00 AM toNever expiresAll Customers Auto Apply 7 / Unlimited Usage Record Edit","expectText":"16th Free Gift Promotion"}

I select unpublish of bulk actions dropdown
I should see 1 unpublished item
